website_summaries.verdict: A great bargain-priced set with lots of pieces. Utensils are included in the set.
pros: Lids are vented for release of steam
Nonstick material is of high quality
cons: Not as oven-friendly as some pricier models

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN I EXPECTED!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a simple/ inexpensive but decent cookware set, go for it! I found the material okay although I haven't used them yet. Overall I think is a good purchase! Update: I'm impressed! Easy to clean, non-stick for real, the handles do not overheat. I have paid 4 times more for my old set and these are way better! Just follow the care instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Gersaly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college students!
customer_reviews.text: These have held up for about a year now and they are still in great condition even though I use them almost everyday. No warping at all, only minimal scratches on some pots, probably due to my own negligence. The sizes are great, I have used all of them multiple times. There are no duds in this set. The lids for the pots also fit the pans! Great design. I am very impressed with the quality of these, especially for the price. Highly recommend, I have had no issues with these. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: puppycat

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: I recently needed to replace my cookware but was not looking forward to the price tag that went along with many sets. I know with cookware you get what you pay for. I didn't want to spend too much but I know cheap is cheap. This set was such a bargain I was unsure at first. I read several reviews and decided to take a chance. I am so glad I did. The product is great and the price didn't hurt my wallet. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: N.O'connell

customer_reviews.title: Refund please.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible pots and utensils... Spatula is melting and the pans are all warping
customer_reviews.author: Jarod

customer_reviews.title: Lost its non stick after one use:/
customer_reviews.text: The black "nonstick" stuff on the pan scratched off after first use... I was so sad. I used plastic utensils too:/ It was only the large pan that lost its nonstick, but I was disappointed nonetheless. I'm giving it one star because I want people to know that they should invest their money into a higher quality product that will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Please Read!!
customer_reviews.text: I see so many on here complaining about the pans warping. These type of pans are not meant to be immediately put under water while they are still hot. They will warp. You let them cool off almost completely then you use dawn and a non scratch pad to clean. It’s all about knowing how to take care of your pots and pans. These are very nice for the price. I knew what to expect and know how to take care of them. Take care of them and they will last you!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the WORST cookware i ever ordered from Amazon..I only used the frying pan..I did not use high heat nor did i use metal utensils and I used olive oil.....BUT the coating came off in the center of the frying pan. Now i am afraid to use the rest of the set...Too late to send it back as i bought it for my RV and just got time to vacation in it..Terrible. AND even worse, i bought 2 sets.. jc
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Cardone

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, love having more size choices when I cook!
customer_reviews.text: I needed more pots with lids and utensils for the new house and this looked like a good deal for my needs. It arrived quickly and in great packing to keep everything safe during shipment. It has a variety of sizes so now I have just the right amount of pots and pans and with the added utensils I don’t have to buy more. Wonderful bundle deal.
customer_reviews.author: TIFPONY

customer_reviews.title: The Essentials for Cookware
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooking set. You need all the essentials in a clean package and covers all your bases this has you covered. Packaging: This came packaged in a great box that held each item together and all items were individually wrapped that ensured it was clean and put together. The pots and pans are very nice and handles really comfortable with great lining. Overall: The utensils, pots and pans are all very nice and worth the value with great clean finishes and lids with clean steel lining.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Wan

customer_reviews.title: good cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my kitchen. It works well. It is easy to use. Holds up well to the heat of the stove. easy to clean. Good value for your money. Takes up very little space. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: ChenDan

customer_reviews.title: Great For The New Cooker
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of non-stick pots and pans- easy to clean in a stunning shade of black. Only proviso- One lid fell off and hit the floor-lid did not shatter as I had expected, but the lid knob did- so be careful. Overall a fine set.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Salniker

customer_reviews.title: Great for your first apartment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my new apartment and after a week of cooking the bottom of the pot started to look a little brown. But I purchased a cheap pot from family dollar and that one doesn't have anything under it. I will definitely be buying a better pot set in a couple months so these will have to do. They're also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbella305

customer_reviews.title: HANDLES GET HOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set was reported to have handles that DO NOT get hot. NOT! The handles have a metal screw that attaches the black hard plastic cover to the actual metal of the pot/pan. So, metal conducts heat and handles get HOT and REQUIRE a hot pad/oven mitt/etc. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Inastateofflux

customer_reviews.title: They work fine, but the biggest pot
customer_reviews.text: I have had these pots and pans for about 11 months now. They work fine, but the biggest pot, when I received it, was bent out of shape and the cover does not close it properly. I didn't return it because it was fairly cheap for this set and I didn't want to go through the hassle of online returns. I bought this as a short term use while in school.
customer_reviews.author: kok boo

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set my sophomore year in college as my first set of cooking supplies. They are a bargain price for a decent set of cookware. I will say that the nonstick part of the pans and pots start to scratch up and deteriorate after a year of consistent (every day) use. After I finish college and find a semi-permanent place, I think I will upgrade, but for now this cookware works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: JC S.Tomas

customer_reviews.title: these are great for someone who doesnt have a lot of money ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, these are great for someone who doesnt have a lot of money or if you want to get your college kid some for his apartment. But if you are serious about cooking, I would recommend some higher quality ones. They are non stick and work well. it is also nice that they come with the utensils. Overall, a great set to have, just on the cheaper end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are sturdy, come in a nice range of sizes and ...
customer_reviews.text: This set arrived on time and undamaged. I've been using them for months and no problems so far! I know some other reviews mentions utensils melting or the nonstick portion coming off, but I haven't had that issue. These are sturdy, come in a nice range of sizes and are very easy to clean. I've put the utensils in the dishwasher several times and they're still in perfect condition. I use a non-scratch scrub brush on the pots/pans and so far non of the interior or exterior has rubbed away.
customer_reviews.author: AcidxBurn

customer_reviews.title: Missing part but over all far
customer_reviews.text: It was good price but 2 tops was missing and the box was not the best but over all I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Michael chambers

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Well you get what you pay for...been using these since September and the nonstick coating just got all over and came off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The pots and pans are great. After 6 months I still have not noticed ...
customer_reviews.text: The pots and pans are great. After 6 months I still have not noticed the usual warping that I have had with most pans that I have had in the past. The only issue may be with the serving/mixing spoons as I find them a little too flexible for my taste. They are still usable. I just had to adapt to them.
customer_reviews.author: Onnie Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: Utensil could not withstand the wear and tear. The pots and pans are good.
customer_reviews.author: Aton Ra

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware. Awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: The first order somehow got lost in transit, Amazon immediately sent out a replacement. Arrived a day later. The pots and pans are great. I've used them all and have no issues. Somethings with lower priced cookware you sometimes get weird smell, not with these. They feel nice very sturdy and seem to heat evenly. I'm very happy with the item. The lost package eventually showed up a few days later.. The amazing Amazon Customer service said I could keep it but I felt weird about that since it was not their fault it was late. They made returning that item very easy. Can't beat amazons service.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is bad. I wish I did not buy this item. Another bad product on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Macky Suson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my brother
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a housewarming gift for my little brother and he likes it so it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Alyshia

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great pots and pans and almost all the necessary tools needed to cook properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Leder

customer_reviews.title: For a basic set, this is fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last week and I really love the value and the appearance and it cooks like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret this purchase! Still works 6 yrs now.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how I bought this is 2014 and here in 2020 It still my main cooking equipment. I took great care of it but com's on now. Quality set. I got it for $30 back then!
customer_reviews.author: michael collins jr

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for heavy cooking but a decent starter set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these during a relocation and while they are a great starter set at a VERY reasonable price, I just don't see the dishes lasting very long. The omelette pan is already losing its non-stickiness and they can be difficult to clean. The pots are actually pretty decent, but the pans that see the direct flame for saute purposes are pretty weak. I will eventually replace them with a higher end set, but they will do the job now, especially for someone that is starting from scratch and may not cook all that much.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald C. Mcconway Jr.

customer_reviews.title: good cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my kitchen. It works well. It is easy to use. Holds up well to the heat of the stove. easy to clean. Good value for your money. Takes up very little space. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: joseph butterworth

customer_reviews.title: Opened the box today-it's a basic set. The utensils ...
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box today-it's a basic set. The utensils feel cheap. The other items are alright, but the lid to the dutch oven does not fit properly. Called Amazon to replace just the dutch oven and lid and was told I would have to package and return the entire set. This was packaged with all kinds of cardboard, plastic, rubberbands, etc. It would be a hassle to go through this all over again if the new set has defects. I'm sending it back, but will re-order a different set. Quality control isn't what it should be.
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: perfect kitchen set for small family!
customer_reviews.text: We've used it for one week and this set works perfectly for my family - parents with a little kid. It has so many different ones so you can assign them different tasks:) My wife loves them and uses them preciously. It's real non stick and the tools coming along with them are very good at protecting the pans. I would recommend this set to small families like us. May not work well for big size families due to the capacity of each pan, but could be ideal for 2-4 ppl.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Huang

customer_reviews.title: Good basic setup, all in one box...
customer_reviews.text: Good basic setup, all in one box... add a colander and you're pretty much set. The aluminum is thick enough to be durable. Everything is well finished - no burrs or blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Guy

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: At first when I saw it I sat on buying it because I felt it was going to be a wast of money. Eventually I gave in and bough it. And I was surprised, its very sturdy, cleans well, and cooks evenly. Its worth the money and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a t-fal set and I hated it. By the end they were such a hassle I threw them out, did lots of research and settled on this. I've ha this set for 5 months now and I love it. It does everything I need it to. I use them multiple times daily. I tried using it in the dish washer and it didn't do a great job, so I hand wash them after use and dry them and store them until I need them. Seriously, I cook at least 3 times a day, for myself my husband and our daughter. It produces great food. Do not doubt this purchase. Wonderful cookware!!
customer_reviews.author: Mal02

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome pots and pans. All the pieces are there. The price is lower than I would expect for a set like this. I haven't had them for long but they clean up very well and have done a good job at cooking everything I've made (and I cook with them everyday). I have had other nice cookware but they were getting old and scratched. Definitely a good purchase, especially if you are just getting your first set of cookware. You shouldn't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the product and with amazon customer service
customer_reviews.text: Its not even been 2 months since i bought this product, already its becoming bad. Product becomes worse every day and its in poor condition.. The non stick black coating is peeling off.. And amazon is not honoring a refund or replacement. very disappointed with the product and with amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Are all a litttllleee bit smaller than I expected, but nonetheless still awesome pots/pans for an awesome price. I like how the lids fit more than one pot, but kinda sucks if you're using both at once. Definitely non stick, had no problem washing out old food even after it sat for a few days. I did NOT have the issue that other purchasers had where the lids/pots/pans were misshapen. All of my lids fit perfectly. Would definitely exceed the 60 bucks if all items were purchased separately so good buy in my book.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: These pans are just fine. I have not had any problems with them ...
customer_reviews.text: These pans are just fine. I have not had any problems with them and have been using them for a year. I treat them with respect and they have not given me any scratches on the inside of the pans. I didn't realize that there was not a big frying pan that came with it which was what I needed but you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: marlene clark

customer_reviews.title: I love my pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for over 5 months and am very happy with them. They are easy to use and I love the comfortable handles and the see thru lids. The utensils were inexpensive quality, but the pans are perfect for me. No complaints. Love the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: LJC747

customer_reviews.title: Last at least for a year
customer_reviews.text: After couple year use it, most of it was broken. Non stick pan turn to be stick, and the middle of the pan was curved.
customer_reviews.author: Love Love Life

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT Buy!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you get an everyday set of pots and pans as well as utensils that fit the needs of any kitchen for frequent use. I have washed these items in the sink as well as in the diswasher with perfect results. Be sure to not use metal inbthe pans to scratch them. I use wooden spoons or the plastic utensils from the set. One other caution...use the TOP rack of your dishwasher for cleaning the plastic utensils or make sure that you air dry the dishes and not use the heating element in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Mihalis in Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Spend a bit more and buy something better if you cool alot.
customer_reviews.text: After using these since December I have had to throw away the pans and the utensils, waiting for the new pots and those are also going in trash. They are great if you cook once a week to make small meals, not recommended for everyday usage.
customer_reviews.author: umair khan

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these when they arrived because the lid to one of the pots was bent and would not fit well. The replacement set came no problem and I have been using these for about 2 years now with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberries404

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Set elegant simple will certainly get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this around 3P.M and like magic by 7:15 P.M the same day they were delivered I write this review because I want to be able to help others who may be on the Hunt for things like this. For under 60 dollars this is a fantastic product check the photo out it even matches my stove :) the utensils are a tad flimsy but outside of that I'm very happy. After going into SAMS club and seeing a 3 piece set for $125 I think I'm more than content with this. I see people writing reviews expecting this to be master chef quality but to me as a simple software engineer I'm sure it will do me well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy somewhat
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving two stars because the large pot handle possibly cracked during transit because I know I didn't drop it in the sink. Anyways, due to the crack in the handle it is now completely broke and falling off. In my eyes, it is not sturdy enough. So far, the other items in this package are great and I love the non stick coating which preseasoned anyway. But, the handle not being tough enough is disappointing because I have to replace it now.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8erChick

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware set. The quality is great. I love the easy grip handles. I like that there are two different sizes of each pot/pan so if I have to cook more or less I can use the right pot. The utensils are very sturdy and it helps so they don't scratch the non-stick surfaces. I am very surprised to have great quality at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: ruben

customer_reviews.title: cheap/mediocre but viable for a 2-5 years of use
customer_reviews.text: 2 years after this purchase: The good: The pots/pans themselves have held up pretty well. The handles just needed a tightening every now and then, but overall they're pretty sturdy and easy to clean. The bad: •The utensils broke. They break right around the handle. They'll eventually just snap. I promise you. It doesn't matter how well you take care of them. If you use them, they will snap eventually. Granted, they lasted 2 years! •The handles on the pot leave this black residue on your hands. I've cleaned them dozens of times now, still leaves my hands all black after I handle them. Overall decent purchase considering the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with my purchase. The pots and pans are non-stick and easy to clean. The only downer is the utensils are kind of flimsy. I feel like I will break the spatula if I push down too hard but other than that it is a good set to buy! You can't beat the price but if your looking for very good quality I would not purchase these. I bought these for my first apartment and they work good for me!
customer_reviews.author: missjackson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pots and skillets!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the lady. She loved it!! Actually....I use them too! The price for the set absolutely could not be beat. The durable non-stick surface is something we had been looking at for quite some time. There were so many different brands out there. I finally settled on this one due to the positive response. Do yourself a favor and pick up a set.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Hands

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If you want to buy a set that comes with pot tops shattered and a pot missing then this is the set for you. The 2 tops were shattered into pieces and 1 of the pots were missing. I’ll come back and let you know how the pans/ pots work
customer_reviews.author: °°°

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black set, very nice and sturdy. I love the fact it comes with a smaller dutch pot. The skillet has sides that hold the oil in for frying things. Great buy ! Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my older father-in-law last year and they are still in good shape. The non-stick coating has not scratched off and there has been no warping of any of the pans. The utensils are flimsy and just stuck in there, hence my 4 stars. The package would have been 5 stars if the utensils had been left out. A waste.
customer_reviews.author: Gummi Mummi

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my wife and I for a new home which she needed some new pots and pans I purchased these is an Amazon warehouse deals because they were open box which no problem that can perfectly package and they were in perfect condition and we love them use of every night for dinner they work great and they are non stick like that states
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: These work really well, one of the pots came faulty, the lid didnt fit properly, I contacted customer service and the response was extremely quick, they sent me a new pot that fits perfectly free pf charge. Use a lower heat than you normally would they heat up really fast, I am very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: CGL

customer_reviews.title: It's true the handle loosens a bit, but that ...
customer_reviews.text: It's true the handle loosens a bit, but that wasn't a big deal for us. We cook with them everyday and have no real complaints. The plasticware that comes with it, does melt, but not insanely either. After all it is plastic and considering the price... I'm not complaining. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Torres

customer_reviews.title: Love the pans
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a house warming party and she absolutely loved it. She just said thank you, over and over
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best nonstick cookware set out there
customer_reviews.text: I just loved this product. I am writing this review more than 5 year after i bought it just because I am still happy with the purchase. Quality of this cookware set is just amazing. It has been working flawlessly for past 5 years with substantial usage.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Modi

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the smallest pan and saucer with lid for a week now. The non stick works. It does not slide around due the textured bottom. I have been careful not to use the utensils that come with it because some reviews say they cannot stand the heat. Accidentally used a metal spatula and scratched the non stick on my pan a bit but it is still holding up fine. Be careful with the cooking utensils you use ... that is a non brainer for those who cook a lot. Everything arrived in very good condition and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Ruma

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: One of the pots in this set was very badly dented . The packaging looked ok. We tried straightening the pot and it was very hard. Looks as though the pot was sanjes prior to packaging. Wish a little more attention had been made in quality control. This was a gift for someone. Not happy .
customer_reviews.author: Swasti Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Good set but needs to be used once before you start cooking.
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook so I was worried these would be too cheap. They are not, but make sure to wash them and also put each pan on the stove once to brun off the top layer of the non stick coating. DO NOT COOK WITH THEM OUT OF THE BOX, whatever you cook will be burned and taste terrible., Once you use them once, they are p[erfectly fine after.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: They are good enough for the money. Not the greatest quality but they are good enough. Have had them for 4 months and they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cookware set. I use it everyday and i have hand washed it multiple times and they are still work just fine. I only use plastic when i cook. I just need to know where i can find a replacement knob for my lid.
customer_reviews.author: Charla Roueche

customer_reviews.title: this is a great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: First allow me to say, I just ordered this yesterday and I received it today, a Sunday. Anyhow, this is a great buy for the money. No it's not a high end, but it's perfect starter...or in my case, I just like changing everything up and it gets expensive. Anyhow, my only issue is one of the lids does NOT fit into its pot correctly. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan set. I have been looking for one for awhile and this one just entered my price range. This makes cooking really easy since you have a wide variety of pots and pans to choose from. They are also really easy to clean and they do not have things stick to them like my previous pans did. Even with something caked on you just have to let it sit for a few minutes in water and it comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on non stick coating before deciding to buy these. I thought they were teflon but they are actually ceramic! The pans are heavy duty and the non stick quality is amazing. I do have to say that I have been cooking only on medium heat to save the coating, which takes a bit longer....
customer_reviews.author: marlies

customer_reviews.title: This is an average product for a very low price ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an average product for a very low price. The dishes have some weird thing when it starts boiling and its starts sprinkling the water/gravy on you. The spatulas are tearing off plastic. One of the pans had a scratch on it when it came. I just didnt want to return it for one scratch.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: It's a good starter set and it'll get your basic cooking needs ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good starter set and it'll get your basic cooking needs done. However, I've only had it a couple days and the cooking spoons are already nearly destroyed by the heat. Also, my larger frying pan came in dented. It's more of an oval than a circle so the lid doesn't fit properly! Not a huge deal for the price, but would have been nice to get everything in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Pot and pan set
customer_reviews.text: Hubby got me this for Christmas. Absolutely love them. Perfect dor everyday cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Ross

customer_reviews.title: Nice pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Nice pots and pans. I have been using them for a couple months now and there are a few burn spots and wear and tear on the bottoms of the pans from our gas stove, besides that they are still in good shape!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Don't let it being cheap deture you!
customer_reviews.text: You have to buy this, I think this is the best thing I bought on Amazon for the price. I have had these pots and pans for a month now and no complaints here and so easy to clean! After having this product for over a year, everything is still in great condition and the only thing that "broke" is my roommate melted the spatula when deep frying other than that this product meets all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Slocomb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for college, honestly not sure how this set got such high reviews. It's a very cheap set, but is also very cheap quality. I didn't cook all that often, yet all the handles of all the pans ended up being loose after half a year of use. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Eldon

customer_reviews.title: Nice cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them for almost a year (everyday) and they still cook without sticking food on the bottom. They get hot pretty fast (normal) and the diferent sizes are very convenient. They also still look great on the outside, soo I'm happy with them. I also like to see the food through the covers. The big plastic spoon and others that also come for cooking with the set are also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana MdA

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty excited. brand new pots
customer_reviews.text: as I was unpacking the box, I was pretty excited. brand new pots, utensils...and then I got to the pans...the bigger of the two is DENTED. maybe just a packing mishap? I don't know. no one is willing to own up. I have to PAY MORE to have this problem solved. no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: shai

customer_reviews.title: but it's a good basic set for a good price
customer_reviews.text: It's probably not the fanciest, but it's a good basic set for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir G.

customer_reviews.title: Great pans, careless shipping!
customer_reviews.text: This nonstick product is great when cooking anything, from pancakes to fried foods. It's also easy to clean. However, when I received my items the box was slightly dented which resulted in one of my skillets being dented. So, 5 stars for the product and 3 stars for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Valued Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Choice!
customer_reviews.text: After a +1 year, its looks perfect! I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Fedra G.

customer_reviews.title: I do like the quality of the pans themselves but I'm definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: It was only a month or two after I purchased this product that I started to notice that my ladles and spatulas started to bend. I'm definitely not impressed with the quality of material they were made with. Also two of the nobs on top of the lids for the pans have completely come off. I do like the quality of the pans themselves but I'm definitely not purchasing this set again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: love these pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: love these pots and pans. great nonstick surface makes cleaning them really easy. this is the second set that i bought because i wanted more. ive had the first set for 2 years now and still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Travis Christ

customer_reviews.title: D
customer_reviews.text: These pans are good but a few of them seem to be warped so the lids don’t fit. It’s a little dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: An okay set for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for about 4 months now, but about a month ago the handle broke on the smallest lid. Am going to try and locate a replacement because I really do like this set. It's lightweight and durable for the money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: CHarding

customer_reviews.title: Its pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: No complaints good for people just starting off after moving or whatever
customer_reviews.author: Raphael J.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a gift
customer_reviews.text: My son has had his own place for like 3 yrs and never bothered to buy pots and pans. When my daughter stayed with him, had to buy him these so she could eat:)
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not the most high quality products (which is probably obvious ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the most high quality products (which is probably obvious from the comparatively low price) but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Anna Y

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep pristine
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the pots and pans gets dirty/ugly fast (at least with electric stove top), but pretty easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Mirage

customer_reviews.title: Good Budget set. Utensils need improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as a replacement. First set was damaged during delivery but replacement was fine. Good for what it is. Lids don't seal very well and can spatter. The included utensils were cheap and flimsy. Fine if you're looking for a set to replace every couple years or so.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Ford

customer_reviews.title: Best Cookery Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought a proper set of cookery before. I always used hand me down stuff from the family. Now for the first time ever, I can fry an egg without breaking the yoke or burning it. I love these pots and pans! The price was about 1/2 of what they sell for in the local PX (and the PX has pretty good prices).
customer_reviews.author: David A. Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set and has so many useful items! I was very disappointed though, as just after one use and wash one of the pots warped and has never recovered. So the lid doesn't sit properly on that pot at all. So if you need a starter set, try this one if you don't need lasting power in your cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed cooking with these pots for over seven years
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed cooking with these pots for over seven years. The only con is that the screws keep loosening.
customer_reviews.author: EddieG

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pots and pans!
customer_reviews.text: So far loving our new Cookware! Great set of pots and pans that clean easily and so far nothing sticks to them!
customer_reviews.author: mommy4three

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a space we use as an Airbnb. The quality is good for the price. I would buy them again for my own kitchen. Pots and pans are a good weight. Not too heavy but not super light. They feel solid and look nice. Obviously not super high end but these don’t look or feel cheap either.
customer_reviews.author: floppy wings is amazingly awesome

customer_reviews.title: ... needed some pots and pans and this was a great buy! I love them
customer_reviews.text: We had just moved out and we needed some pots and pans and this was a great buy! I love them.
customer_reviews.author: rachel warhover

customer_reviews.title: Quite Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: These pots, pans, and scoops are really the best I've seen for this price. I just graduated so am populating my new kitchen with starter sets of everything. For someone who likes cooking once in a while but is no fanatic, this is perfect. I use this to do one thing: cook. No sticking, rusting, or malfunction thus far and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Warning!

customer_reviews.title: POTS DO NOT WORK! DO NOT BOIL WATER!
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous. Never knew it were possible for pots to not work, but I'm super frustrated because these pots DO NOT boil water! wasted 45 minutes trying to get my water to boil! SO PISSED OFF. These will be going back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable quality but the fry pan is not that big
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality although I find the fry pan too small so you have to buy another. I ended up getting a 13" kitchen aid from amazon to set up a rental with this set. The utensils are OK at best and will be broken in no time but the pans are fine.
customer_reviews.author: MKAFILM

customer_reviews.title: Decent cheap cooking set
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this set I was single living in an apartment, then I got married and now my wife uses them a everyday, they are very good quality and for the price they are a good buy. After 3 years of use they are still rocking it. Pros: - Price - Lots of accessories Cons: - The handles on the pans and on the lids get loose after some use
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Great set but covers may not fit pans
customer_reviews.text: This set is very useful as a college student who needs cheap pots and pans that are easy to cook with and clean. Unfortunately the largest pot cover does not fit on the 10 inch frying pan correctly as the pan was slightly bent during shipping. While this is not enough to justify shipping it back to amazon for me, it does detract from the overall value of the large pan when frying food that must be covered.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Delivered in the middle of my drive way.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product but I'm very unsatisfied with the way it was delivered to my house. They left it in the middle of my drive way not even close to my house or the mail box.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for about 3 weeks now and find them easy to heat up and to clean. Now I am not a cook and really not that picky but there is nothing about these items that annoy me. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 3 months now, and I use one or more of these everyday. The non-stick surface is exceptional, nothing sticks! Very easy to cleanup, and looks great. It works MUCH better than my more expensive previous set. I am going to retire that one and buy another one of these. Highly recommended. Will put in an update in a few months to let you guys know if it retains its qualities. Update 3/7/2013 - More than year and half later, this set is still going strong. There has been some expected wear and tear as I do still use them everyday, but the non-stick surface is still great. I would still highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richa Rai

customer_reviews.title: Don't use metal hardware.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, good non stick cooking set. Good heavy guage pots and fry pans.
customer_reviews.author: mark

product_meta.title: Cook N Home 15-Piece Nonstick Stay Cool Handle Cookware Set, Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:Cookware SetThe Cook N Home 15-Piece Nonstick Soft Handle Cookware Set, Black includes: 1 quart saucepan with lid, 2 quart saucepan with lid, 3 quart casserole with lid, 5 quart dutch oven stockpot with lid, 8-inch fry pan, 10-inch fry pan and 5-piece nylon utensils. Made of thick gauge aluminum that provides even heat conduction and prevents hot spots. Nonstick coating makes food release/cleaning easy and allows for healthy cooking. Tempered glass lids with steam vent for viewing food while cooking. Lids fit on fry pans. Silicone soft touch handles are comfortable, stay cool, and non-slip. Utensil set includes: spoon, slotted spoon, pasta server, ladle, and spatula. Works on: gas, electric, glass, ceramic, halogen, etc. Not Induction compatible and not oven safe. Dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Includes: 1 and 2 qt saucepans, 3 qt casserole, 5 qt dutch oven stockpot with lids, 8 in. fry pan, 10 in. fry pan, and 5-piece nylon utensils
Made of thick gauge aluminum that provides even heat conduction and prevents hot spots
Nonstick coating makes food release/cleaning easy; Handles are comfortable and stay cool
Tempered glass lids with steam vent for viewing food while cooking; Lids fit on fry pans
Works on: gas, electric, glass, ceramic, halogen, etc; Not induction/oven safe; Dishwasher safe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,561 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
